docs.lead_paragraph: For all but a few Americans, says the author, life can't be lived without drugs. Even those who reject the idea spend so much time 'withstanding the chemical temptations that beset them' that they are 'addicted to not being addicted.'

headline.main: Ours Is The Addicted Society; The Addicted Society (Cont.)

docs.abstract: L H Farber article attributes rise in addiction to anxieties caused by modern soc and increase in dependence on drugs
docs.snippet: For all but a few Americans, says the author, life can't  be lived without drugs. Even those who reject the idea spend so much time 'withstanding the chemical temptations that beset them' that they are 'addicted  to not being addicted.'
